import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Calendar, MapPin, Clock, Trophy, Users, CheckCircle2, Info } from 'lucide-react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [tournamentData, setTournamentData] = useState({ overview: { totalMatches: '31', poolPlay: '18', championship: '7', estimatedFinish: '3:30 PM' }, schedule: { poolPlay: [], quarterfinals: [], semifinals: [], final: {} }, teams: { elite: { A: [], B: [] }, development: { C: [], D: [] } }, bracket: { quarterfinals: [], semifinals: [], final: {}, consolation: { elite: [], development: [] } } }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchTournamentData(); }, []); const fetchTournamentData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const [overviewRes, scheduleRes, teamsRes, bracketRes] = await Promise.all([ fetch('/api/tournament/overview'), fetch('/api/tournament/schedule'), fetch('/api/tournament/teams'), fetch('/api/tournament/bracket') ]); if (!overviewRes.ok || !scheduleRes.ok || !teamsRes.ok || !bracketRes.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch tournament data'); } const [overview, schedule, teams, bracket] = await Promise.all([ overviewRes.json(), scheduleRes.json(), teamsRes.json(), bracketRes.json() ]); setTournamentData({ overview: { totalMatches: overview.totalMatches || '31', poolPlay: overview.poolPlay || '18', championship: overview.championship || '7', estimatedFinish: overview.estimatedFinish || '3:30 PM' }, schedule, teams, bracket }); } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching tournament data:', err); setError('Failed to load tournament data. Using default data.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
Loading tournament data...
); } return (
{/* Header */}

February 15, 2025
2 Fields
9:00 AM Start

)} {activeTab === 'overview' && } {activeTab === 'schedule' && } {activeTab === 'bracket' && } {activeTab === 'teams' && }
); } const Overview = ({ data }) => (
{/* Stats Grid */}
{[ { label: 'Total Matches', value: data.totalMatches }, { label: 'Pool Play', value: data.poolPlay }, { label: 'Championship', value: data.championship }, { label: 'Estimated Finish', value: data.estimatedFinish } ].map((stat, i) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Format */}

Tournament Format

Elite Division (6 teams): Two pools, all teams advance to 8-team championship bracket. Quarterfinalists play consolation matches.

Development Division (8 teams): Two pools, winners join Elite bracket. Remaining teams compete by rank: 2v2, 3v3, 4v4.

Match Structure: 16-minute matches with 5-minute turnovers between fields.

Lunch Break: 30-minute break at 12:30 PM.

{/* Key Details */}

Important Information

Field Assignments

  • Pool play utilizes both fields simultaneously
  • Championship matches on Field 1
  • Consolation matches on Field 2

Team Requirements

  • Arrive 15 minutes before scheduled match
  • Bring adequate hydration and nutrition
  • Monitor schedule board for updates
); const Schedule = ({ data }) => (

Complete Schedule

{/* Phase 1 */}

Phase 1: Pool Play

9:00 AM 12:09 PM
{(data.poolPlay && data.poolPlay.length > 0 ? data.poolPlay : [ ['9:00 AM', 'Pool A: A1 vs A2', 'Pool C: C1 vs C2'], ['9:21 AM', 'Pool B: B1 vs B2', 'Pool D: D1 vs D2'], ['9:42 AM', 'Pool A: A2 vs A3', 'Pool C: C1 vs C3'], ['10:03 AM', 'Pool B: B2 vs B3', 'Pool D: D1 vs D3'], ['10:24 AM', 'Pool A: A3 vs A1', 'Pool C: C1 vs C4'], ['10:45 AM', 'Pool B: B3 vs B1', 'Pool D: D1 vs D4'], ['11:06 AM', 'Pool C: C2 vs C3', 'Pool D: D2 vs D3'], ['11:27 AM', 'Pool C: C2 vs C4', 'Pool D: D2 vs D4'], ['11:48 AM', 'Pool C: C3 vs C4', 'Pool D: D3 vs D4'] ]).map((row, i) => ( ))}
Time Field 1 Field 2
{row.time || row[0]} {row.field1 || row[1]} {row.field2 || row[2] || ''}

Lunch Break

12:09 PM 12:39 PM (30 minutes)

Phase 2: Championship Quarterfinals

12:39 PM 2:03 PM
{(data.quarterfinals && data.quarterfinals.length > 0 ? data.quarterfinals : [ ['12:39 PM', 'QF1: Seed 1 vs Seed 8 (Dev C #1)', 'Field 1'], ['1:00 PM', 'QF2: Seed 4 vs Seed 5', 'Field 1'], ['1:21 PM', 'QF3: Seed 2 vs Seed 7 (Dev D #1)', 'Field 1'], ['1:42 PM', 'QF4: Seed 3 vs Seed 6', 'Field 1'] ]).map((row, i) => ( ))}
{row.time || row[0]} {row.match || row[1]} {row.field || row[2]}
{/* Phase 3 & 4 */}

Phase 3: Semifinals & Consolation

2:03 PM 4:09 PM
{(data.semifinals && data.semifinals.length > 0 ? data.semifinals : [ ['2:03 PM', 'SF1: Winner QF1 vs Winner QF2', 'Field 1'], ['2:03 PM', 'Elite Consol 1: Loser QF1 vs Loser QF2', 'Field 2'], ['2:24 PM', 'SF2: Winner QF3 vs Winner QF4', 'Field 1'], ['2:24 PM', 'Elite Consol 2: Loser QF3 vs Loser QF4', 'Field 2'], ['2:45 PM', 'Dev 2nd Place: Pool C #2 vs Pool D #2', 'Field 2'], ['3:06 PM', 'Dev 3rd Place: Pool C #3 vs Pool D #3', 'Field 2'], ['3:27 PM', 'Dev 4th Place: Pool C #4 vs Pool D #4', 'Field 2'] ]).map((row, i) => ( ))}
{row.time || row[0]} {row.match || row[1]} {row.field || row[2]}

2:45 PM Field 1

Winner SF1 vs Winner SF2

{match.team1 || match[0]}
{match.team2 || match[1]}
))}

Semifinals

{match.team1 || match[0]}
{match.team2 || match[1]}
))}

Final

{data.final?.team1 || 'Winner SF1'}

{match.team1 || match[0]}

{match.place || match[2]}
{match.team1 || match[0]}
{match.team2 || match[1]}
))}
); const Teams = ({ data }) => (

))}

))}
); export default App;
